9 February 2018

Ascometal® joining SCHMOLZ+BICKENBACH Group

Ascometal® is since February 1st 2018 part of the SCHMOLZ+BICKENBACH Group If you wish to know more about the group, please visit http://www.schmolz-bickenbach.com/en/ More...
12 January 2016

Signature of Joint Venture between Asco Industries SAS and Maanshan Iron&Steel Company.,Ltd. in the field of Special steel

Un projet de premier ordre s’est concrétisé le 7 décembre 2015 à l’occasion de la signature à Maanshan, Chine, d’un contrat de JV entre 2 acteurs majeurs des aciers longs spéciaux.

L’objectif principal de cette  Joint Venture, nommée MASCOMETAL, est de fabriquer en Chine, et de vendre en Asie, des barres et du fil en aciers spéciaux, en phase avec les exigences croissantes de Qualité exprimées par les industries asiatiques du monde automobile.

More...
12 January 2016

Asco Industries will exhibit at Wire 2016

From April 4th to 8th, Hall 15, stand J32, Asco Industries, with Ascometal GmbH, will be present at the Wire exhibition of Düsseldorf, Germany. More...
7 July 2015

Asco Industries receives award for Best Customer-Supplier relationship

Asco Industries a entrepris des actions multiples destinées à renforcer la qualité de ses échanges avec ses clients. More...
6 February 2015

Toyota Motor Europe bestows a 2014 Certificate Of Recognition to Asco Industries

Le 1er Avril 2015, Toyota Motor Europe (TME) a acté du haut niveau de Qualité chez ASCO INDUSTRIES, en lui attribuant un Certificate Of Recognition pour la performance constatée en 2014. Le Certificate Of Recognition de TME : une distinction que chaque fournisseur industriel recherche activement, quand si peu parviennent à l’obtenir. More...
12 April 2014

October 2014 : ASCO INDUSTRIES SAS participates to AWT in Wiesbaden MAI 2014

Ascometal SAS entered into Special Administration " Redressement Judiciaire " on March 7th 2014, following the decision taken by Commercial Court of Nanterre, France. As a result of the judicial decision on 22 May 2014, from the same Commercial court, it has been decided to transfer the activities of Ascometal SAS to the French company Asco Industries. More...
22 March 2013

CWD 2013 (Center for Wind Power Drives), Aachen (Germany), 19th- 20th of March 2013

Conference Ascometal at " the Conference for Wind Power Drives" More...
15 October 2012

Heat treatment congress in Wiesbaden (Germany), from 10th to 12th October 2012

Heat treatment congress in Wiesbaden (Germany), from 10th to 12th October 2012 Stand Ascometal, Hall 1 Stand 128 ASCOMETAL will take part to the API ( American Petroleum Institute) june session in the USA More...
19 October 2011

may to november

May : forum windmill in Dunkerque Conference and stand Ascometal October : AWT in Wiessbaden (Germany) Stand Ascometal October : Symposia Oil and Gas in Houston (USA), organised by Ascometal November : participation Ascometal in the conference ASTM More...
20 October 2010

june to octobrer

A3TS : 38th congress of heat treatment and surface engineering, June 16th to 18th, Metz Conference Ascometal, thursday June 17th : "Microalloyed steels for forged components" T. Sourmail, G. Baudry, C. Maillard Salin Visit at the industrial mill, Ascometal Hagondange, friday June 18th: Elaboration and heat treatments of special steels for automotive and mechanical applications More...
